name: Ayesha Rahman
story: After completing the diploma program, Ayesha secured a position at a leading local firm where she works on practical engineering projects. She credits the hands-on workshops and placement support for her success.

name: Rafi Ahmed
story: Rafi used the IT training to build web applications and now freelances for international clients. He recommends the career guidance and practical labs to all new students.

name: Mina Khan
story: Mina completed maritime certification and now works on coastal projects. Her story highlights how short vocational courses can open global opportunities.

name: Sabbir Hossain
story: Sabbir started a small repair shop after graduation and now employs three trainees from the program. Hands-on training and industry linkups helped him launch his business.

name: Farhana Sultana
story: Farhana joined a garment factory as a quality control assistant and quickly moved into a supervisory role thanks to practical experience and internships.

name: Jamal Uddin
story: Jamal contributed to local infrastructure projects and gained leadership experience through project-based learning during his studies.

name: Nusrat Jahan
story: Nusrat's portfolio created during an advanced workshop helped her land a role at a design studio. Her case shows creative career paths from vocational programs.

name: Tanvir Islam
story: Tanvir became a certified welder and now trains apprentices. He emphasizes the importance of safety training and certified instructors.
